name: Polygon (Matic)
description: Polygon connects the blockchain technology that Ethereum is built on with other compatible platforms, allowing numerous transactions to occur on the blockchain, thus decreasing the congestion on the Ethereum network. It allows for faster movement of tokens along its network while simultaneously costing a significant amount less than the Ethereum Network.

name: USDC
description: USDC will always have the same value as the US Dollar. USDC is a digital currency that is anchored to the dollar, making it redeemable on a 1:1 basis with the dollar.

name: Wrapped ETH
description: Ethereum token on Polygon. Biggest and most important smart contract platform

name: Chainlink
description: ChainLink improves the blockchain technology, by allowing real world information to be input into all of the blocks on the blockchain. This is done by smart contracts that are programmed to create an action based on information that is incoming. Smart contracts eliminate human error by creating automated processes. ChainLink provides fully developed smart contracts that can be applied to any blockchain by any developer.

name: AAVE
description: Aave was created to allow you as a consumer to lend, borrow and earn interest on your crypto without needing a middleman (bank or other financial firm). Aave enables peer to peer lending and borrowing through a series of smart contracts within the blockchain. Aave’s smart contracts manages all of the assets within a transaction.

name: Uniswap
description: Uniswap is a fully decentralized exchange allowing users to make trades on the Ethereum network. This exchange is unlike the traditional exchange model because it allows users to pool liquidity together to allow for trading. Uniswap is also different from the traditional model because it allows users to hold their tokens instead of having to place them into a third party's control.

name: renBTC
description: Ren allows users to buy Bitcoin without buying Bitcoin. Ren acts as the bridge that joins blockchains to allow for interchange of tokens across different networks. This allows for Bitcoin tokens to be anchored to the  ethereum network, so users can access the value of bitcoin through a token on the Ethereum network.

name: TrustSwap
description: TrustSwap offers secure, customizable transactions that can be made with ease and minimal fees anywhere in the world. TrustSwap is an escrow service that removes third party facilitation of transactions, and replaces them with smart contracts.

name: SushiSwap
description: SushiSwap is a fully decentralized exchange allowing users to trade on the Ethereum and Polygon networks. SushiSwap enables peer to peer lending and borrowing through a series of smart contracts within the blockchain.

name: QuickSwap
description: QuickSwap is a fully decentralized exchange allowing users with tokens to make trades on the Polygon network. This exchange is unlike the traditional exchange model because it allows users to pool tokens together to make trades from the fund. Uniswap is also different from the traditional model because it allows users to hold their tokens instead of having to place them into a third party's control.

name: Balancer
description: Balancer allows token holders to create their own index fund with a portfolio of custom tokens they choose. Balancer also allows users to deposit tokens into custom portfolios Balancers has created, which will rebalance themselves according to market data. Users are rewarded for participating in these funds with varying APY generated by staking and other fees collected through their protocol.

name: 1inch
description: Multi-chain aggregator of decentralized exchanges

name: DecentraLand
description: DecentraLand is a network running on Ethereum that allows users to operate within a shared virtual world. Users on the DecentraLand platform can buy and sell virtual land / real estate, as well as explore, interact and play games within this digital world. DecentraLand utilizes smart contracts that are layered upon one another to coincide with each part of the virtual world.

name: SuperFarm
description: Non-fungible tokens are unique and can only be purchased online. SuperFarm was created to make the purchasing of NFT’s more accessible to a larger audience. Users on SuperFarm can create and distribute non-fungible tokens that are made available to connect further with an audience

name: Aavegotchi
description: A digital financial enabled game that allows players to leverage non-fungible tokens to obtain interest-generating tokens to create an avatar within the metaverse. These avatars, called Aavegotchi’s, are pixelated ghosts that live on the Ethereum blockchain that have different values associated with them that allow them to be rare. The more rare the avatar is the more successful they will be.

name: The Graph
description: A software that is able to take data points from other companies, disseminates it into an average to then be distributed as a batch. The Graph has the ability to collect many different data points related to one topic through Nodes. The Nodes then plug the information gathered into Subgraphs.

name: Unibright
description: A service designed to integrate existing enterprise business processes with blockchain-powered features.  Allows confidential business transactions across open, public blockchains.  Enables confidential and complex collaboration between enterprises on a regulatory-friendly blockchain platform.  Runs over multiple blockchains such as Ethereum and Cardano.

name: Curve
description: Decentralized money market & DeFi

name: Ramp
description: Unlocking capital from other chains

name: ExceedMe
description: (The main goal of ExceedMe is to build a platform that users could play-to-earn on their favorite games in a way that is fair and trustworthy. Since 1 in 4 people in the world play video games, ExceedMe gives users the opportunity to make money while doing what they love. The ExceedMe platform gives gamers the opportunity to play games regardless of their skill level and without predatory ads in the current Free2Play model

name: Telcoin
description: Payment service, from cell phones to blockchain
